about_the_game:
Live the life of wannabe rockstar!

Take That Mainstage! combines several gameplay styles, including life management, song crafting, conversation battling and rhythm game competition into a unique and innovative life management sim.

Tune into the radio to find the hottest events. Plan your day, manage your skills, gear, and relationships. Influence people, recruit band mates, and sometimes maybe even sleep. Head out and busk for cash, catch a movie, whatever inspires you. The world is open and only you can create your unique path to stardom. Every play through generates a new cast of characters that go about their lives you’ll need to engage with to gain the inspiration you, the artist, needs.

Relationships are key

The people of the world generate thousands of thoughts they think constantly in their diary, all based off their unique personalities. Conversation battle to gain as much of them as you can!

You'll use the things you learn about the world, other people, reactions, and moods from your notebook to talk to, influence, and build (or ruin) relationships. The secrets you can get them to share become the lyrics for your hit songs!

Practice makes perfect

Do you want to be the top drawing live act? Focus on your guitar skills, on-stage charisma, and stage decorations. Or a world class songwriter/recording artist? Level up your song crafting skills and spend resources in the recording studio & on marketing.

Grind your skills by practicing guitar! Earn cash and buy sheet music to learn new chords to write better songs. 

A Great Song Can Change The World

Writing songs requires lyrics and music. Choose your genre and then spend inspiration,  thoughts and moods to make or follow trends.  Select the drums, guitars and chords to write REAL MUSIC using the drag & drop song crafter. You'll have to rehearse and perform your songs on stage, like a real rockstar!

Battle of the Bands

Compete in events against nightly traveling bands and the quarterly big boss local bands to become the top draw. Perform your bands greatest hits and wow the crowd. You'll have to read the room, play the songs that fit the mood of the audience. Then, while your rival performs, tune your guitars, mingle with the crowd to learn their thoughts, change your stage decorations, whatever it takes to achieve your dreams!

Coming Spring 2026.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2120 / AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • Storage: 8000 MB available space

short_description: It’s 1992 in Emerald City. The world screams for change. Live the creative life and become the next big thing in the ultimate wannabe rockstar life sim! Level up your skills, craft & perform music, manage relationships & compete against your rivals in your quest to achieve your rockstar dreams!
